text: Gelyfest ðu on þone ælmihtig fæder & sunu and þam halgan gast?
<Heald> þa xii ymbren dagas þe on twelf <monðum>.
Þine teoþunge do to godes cyrican & <earmum> <&> lufa cirican georne <god> <mild> <&> þu most mid <him>.
<&> ic <bidde> <þæt> <þu> <geworht> <betere> <beforan> me <anum> <þonne> eft on domes dæge beforan <gode> <beforan> <eallum> <hefenwarum> <&> <eorðwarum> <&> <eac> <hellwarum>.
